article.title: The reverberation signatures of rotating disc winds in active galactic nuclei

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the color gradient on the isodelay surfaces represent in this figure?
choices: The redshift of photons scattering off that point.
The ionization state of gas at that point.
The total path length to the observer for photons scattering off that point.
The velocity of gas at that point.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the term "biconical" refer to in the context of this disc wind geometry?
choices: The shape of the accretion disc.
The outflow geometry of the wind.
The shape of the central source.
The distribution of clouds within the wind.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which velocity-delay map corresponds to a purely rotating Keplerian disc?
What does the virial factor \'f\' account for in the context of SMBH mass estimates?
choices: The uncertainties in measuring the line width and time lag.
The non-spherical geometry and inclination effects of the BLR.
The contribution of gas pressure to the dynamics of the BLR.
The uncertainties in measuring the distance to the AGN.
